__e: You're lucky. You say you were lost in the woods... you're lucky one of my boys didn't get on to you, take you for the convicts.
They must have me muddled up with someone else.
I'm sorry. I think you have confused James with someone else.
I think he's confusing me with someone else.
I think you have me confused with someone else.
I think your mother confuses me with you.
